name: Nessa Belly Expansion Mini-Game
description:
WARNING: This game features belly expansion fetish content.

This project features Nessa from the Pokemon series, whose belly swells while in proximity to the gem on the table. The gem has limited charge, but can be recharged by clicking on it.

Artwork (used with permission) is by Pacci-d on DeviantArt:
https://www.deviantart.com/pacci-d

Controls:
Click the on-screen speaker button to mute/unmute the game.
Click/hold left mouse button on Nessa's belly for interaction.
Click the green gem on the left side of the table to activate the recharging mini-game.
While in the recharging mini-game, the gem will follow the cursor. Particles will occasionally stream up or down the screen, and will be collected by the gem to charge it.
Click the arrow on the mini-game screen to return to the main screen.
When Nessa's belly reaches maximal size (which is quite large), the gem will break to signal the end of the mini-game.
